ActJudges Act
SubjectElizabeth M. Cooper ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Raymond McLean Cooper **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to ELIZABETH M. COOPER, widow of the Hon. Raymond McLean Cooper, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective February 22, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
